title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae legend and star of ‘The Harder They Come, dies at 81
description: Cliff was nominated for seven Grammys and won twice for best reggae album. Many still know his music by "Many Rivers to Cross."

title: Jimmy Cliff Death: 'The Harder They Come' Reggae Superstar Dies at 81
description: Jimmy Cliff, the reggae superstar credited with bringing the music to the world with his film 'The Harder They Come' has died at 81.

title: Reggae pioneer Jimmy Cliff dies at 81
description: Jimmy Cliff, the charismatic reggae pioneer and actor who preached defiance, joy and endurance in such classics as “Many Rivers to Cross,” “You Can Get it If You Really Want” and “Vietnam” and starred in the landmark movie “The Harder They Come,” has died at …

title: The triumph of Christianity over the Viking raiders

title: Who was St Edmund the Martyr and why do we remember him?
description: 20 November is St Edmund’s Day, celebrating the king and martyr who was once the patron saint of England. This is his story.
